content: I am currently in Melbourne, and I think we met in DeepSpec summer school, Princeton.
Hi Mukesh! Sorry I missed the thread. Long time no see! :)
Hi Scott, You probably don't know me, but I know you. I was a PhD student at the Logic Group, ANU, Canberra and Dirk was my supervisor.

@Qian Hong (wechat: fracting) I am glad that finally you saw my message :)
@Joshua Moses Hi Joshua, nice to meet you.

Btw, there is a formal methods gathering, Formal Methods in Australia/New Zealand on 30 Sep - 1 Oct 2021 at The University of Queensland, St Lucia, https://wp.csiro.au/cdng/ (It's not updated yet, but hopefully, once it is finalise I will update here).
@Mukesh Tiwari cool, that's just in a few months, sounds exciting!
Hello! Recently graduated student from USYD here, hoping to get into Lean over the summer
Iâ€™m on the Central Coast north of Sydney and looking forward to using Lean 4 for self-study of maths concepts.
Even aside from mathlib Lean looks very interesting as a general FP language too.
I'm in Sydney for a few days now...
